## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Objectives


::: {.cell}

:::


1.  Learners can apply 12 principles for data organisation in spreadsheets to the layout of a provided dataset.
2.  Learners can discuss the difference between data in an unprocessed structure and in a processed structure.
